name: Super Freaks 1 Classic
description:
Super Freaks 1 is a 2D platformer made with Game Maker 6 in 2006. Because it was my first “real” game (if you could call it that), I have a huge soft spot for it! In 2016 I tore out a lot of the old code (drag and drop blocks) and overhauled some things here and there. It’s definitely still a 2006 Game Maker 6 game, but nowadays it’s decent enough to be uploaded here to itch.io. I'm pretty much done updating this version of the game, but if you notice something glaringly awful let me know and I'll try to fix it as best as I can!

If you want to play the genuinely good full remake of this game, check out the in-development Super Freaks 1 Ultimate Edition: Super Freaks 1 Ultimate Edition by SuperFreaksDev (itch.io). It's 100x better and actually feels like a real platformer!
